price: 48. Nummah Nabii Muusaa kee Nabii Haaruunuh cakkii kee baatil ittak baxsaah, tirri elle iyyan noorii kee Yallak meesita marah kassis yakke kitab (tawraat kinnuk) necee axcuk xiibita Yalli.
arabic: وَلَقَدۡ ءَاتَيۡنَا مُوسَىٰ وَهَٰرُونَ ٱلۡفُرۡقَانَ وَضِيَآءٗ وَذِكۡرٗا لِّلۡمُتَّقِينَ

version.title: Afar translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Afar by a group of scholars. under supervision of Shaikh Mahmud Abdulkader Hamza. 1441 H.

meta.transliteration: walaqad ātaynā mūsā wahārūna al-fur'qāna waḍiyāan wadhik'ran lil'muttaqīna
